title: cultural_data_USFMobile
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.usf.usfmobile.
Application Name: USFMobile.
Number of Reviews: 31.00.
Application Description: Welcome to USF Mobile 3.0! Whether you’re a visitor to the University of San Francisco or a member of the community, choose your role and then see content and events especially for you. Place your favorite resources at the top of the menu to keep them handy. Download the official USF mobile app now. Go Dons!Features:• Access your classes, schedule, grades, and holds• View dining options and add funds to your One Card• Find the nearest bus route and transit times• View university events and daily exercise classes — search, bookmark, and add to your calendarSupported android versions: 5 and above.
Number of Characters in Description: 601.00.
Overall Rate: 3.90.
First Page Reviews: UPDATE: Fixed. Updated score. After I input my access code, it does nothing .
to sign me in. I can continually add the access code, but I cannot sign in. Easier to use than even the school website brilliant work. Nice app overall Needs some design improvements though Thank you for the update! The update is awesome.  I use a Samsung Galaxy S4 and the previous version nearly drove me insane. I loved the idea but it ran slowly and sometimes it didn't even open. I almost deleted it, but this new update is so nice. It looks good and runs smoothly. Thank you for finally fixing it!.
